description:
A tool to join several videos into one large video file.

Free Video Joiner is a tool that can join several videos into one large video file, it is a powerful tool and easy to use, works fast and keeps the quality of video, supports many video formats include AVI (Divx,XviD,MPEG4), WMV, MPEG (MPEG1 and MPEG2), MP4, MOV, DVD, VCD and other formats. This free tool does not require any technical experience and is very easy to use.
